name: devsuite
description: Una suite integral de herramientas para desarrolladores y creativos, diseñada para ser rápida, intuitiva y estéticamente agradable.

scripts.build: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (fs.existsSync('public')) fs.rmSync('public', { recursive: true, force: true }); fs.mkdirSync('public/dist', { recursive: true }); fs.mkdirSync('public/icons', { recursive: true }); fs.copyFileSync('index.html', 'public/index.html'); fs.copyFileSync('manifest.json', 'public/manifest.json'); fs.copyFileSync('service-worker.js', 'public/service-worker.js'); if(fs.existsSync('icons/icon-192.png')) fs.copyFileSync('icons/icon-192.png', 'public/icons/icon-192.png'); if(fs.existsSync('icons/icon-512.png')) fs.copyFileSync('icons/icon-512.png', 'public/icons/icon-512.png');" && npx tailwindcss -i ./input.css -o ./public/dist/styles.css --minify && esbuild index.tsx --bundle --outfile=public/dist/bundle.js --minify --jsx=automatic
